SupportPackage.name: NI-DAQmx
SupportPackage.fullname: Data Acquisition Toolbox Support Package for National Instruments NI-DAQmx Devices
SupportPackage.infotext: Acquire and analyze data from NI-DAQmx devices.
SupportPackage.preuninstallcmd: matlab:msgbox('The NI-DAQmx drivers are not uninstalled as part of uninstalling the support package. If you would like to remove the NI-DAQmx drivers, please uninstall it using the Add or Remove Programs option in Control Panel.', 'Uninstall Notification', 'modal')
